author: John Bowden
title: Japan expanding state of emergency to entire nation
description: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe officially extended a state of emergency across all of Japan on Thursday as officials warn that coronavirus infections in the country could be spiking.In a tweet, the prime minist...
content:
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe officially extended a state of emergency across all of Japan on Thursday as officials warn that coronavirus infections in the country could be spiking.
In a tweet, the prime minister's office announced that Abe made the ann… [+1282 chars]
